transcript.title: WA ELECTION WIN
transcript.content:
C
K~ r
PRIME MINISTER
WA ELECTION WIN
I congratulate Richard Court on a very strong win. He and his colleagues
have provided effective reform in Government.
They inherited great difficulties in the wake of the WA Inc. excesses of the
former Labor Government. Economic growth in Western Australian is
now stronger than in any other part of the nation.
I look forward to a continued close partnership with Richard Court for the
benefit of all Western Australians.
December 1996
2612 * 1
r
